name: 2024 12th International Conference on Knowledge Discovery
content: Publications: Submissions will be peer reviewed by conference committees, and accepted papers will be published in Conference Proceedings, which will be submitted for indexing by EI Compendex, Scopus, and other major databases. Authors are encouraged to submit your extended papers to International Journal of Knowledge Engineering for review, and accepted papers will be published in regular issues of IJKE free of charge, which will be indexed by Google Scholar, Crossref, ProQuest, etc. Please send both your original paper and extended paper to IJKE through ijke@ejournal.net and include ICKD 2024 in the subject of your email.
organizers: Faculty of Business - City University of Macau
